item.title: front
item.description: I study how agricultural root microbiomes assemble, focusing on processes and mechanisms that can inform the development of appropriate tools for sustainable intensive agriculture.

item.title: Research
item.description: Research Goals and Interests My long-term goal is to develop a microbiome-informed agronomy taking into account the evolutionary and ecological complexity of plant-microbiota interactions. Some of my interests include: The rhizosphere effect and plant immune interactions with microbiota. The symbiosis spectrum of the root microbiome: pathogens, commensals, and mutualists. Microbiome dynamics specific to agricultural systems. Publications Edwards, J., Santos-Medellín, C., Nguyen, B., Kilmer, J., Liechty, Z.
